title: Peter Thomas Roth AHA/BHA Acne Clearing Gel 2 fl oz
description: A potent medicated oil-free blemish clearing gel for the prevention and treatment of acne. Contains maximum strength beta hydroxy acid (salicylic acid 2%) and potent alpha hydroxy acid (glycolic acid complex 10%).  Oil-free, fragrance-free deep pore clearing gel, exclusively formulated to clear up whiteheads, acne blemishes and blackheads, re-fine pores and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Helps regulate healthy cell turnover for a clear, flawless complexion.

title: Benefit Cosmetics erase paste concealer - dark 03
description: Signs of stress & fatigue are a thing of the past with this innovative formula. This concentrated, creamy, blendable concealer instantly brightens & camouflages all-in-one. The three brightening neutral shades give every gal correction perfection.

title: Dermablend Cover Creme - Chroma 1 - Rose Beige, 1 oz
Eye Zone Lifting Massager. Micro-mini Current. Battery Operated.
description:
This little microcurrent device works from AAA batteries (BATTERIES ARE INCLUDED). It produces very low electrical current of micro Ampere.

Microcurrent is widely used by cosmetologists for the face lift treatments. Usually you need from 10 to 14 microcurrent sessions with monthly supporting treatment to maintain your results. In this case portable microcurrent device could be useful. If you spend 10-15 min as your weekly skin care routine you can save for your monthly visit.

This microcurrent device is very light, easy to use and suitable for travel. Just put it in your purse and you have your own cosmetologists on hand! It is ideal microcurrent device for those who want to try the treatment before to invest in more powerful machine. In this case every day 10 min massage around the eye area during 2 weeks will show you the rejuvenating ablilities of microcurrent face lift.

title: Palmers Cocoa Butter Bust Firming Cream 4.4oz
description: Firm And Tone Your Bust Even After Pregnancy And Weight Loss Specially Formulated Cream That Smoothes On Like A Gel Unique Blend Of Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter And Vitamin E To Maximize Moisturization Collagen And Elastin Help Restructure The Elastic Fibers And Increase Tone And Firmness

title: COQ10, Hyaluronic Acid, Matrixyl 3000 and Argireline Cell Repair Concentrate Serum..Boost Collagen, Repair Cells, Tighten and Smooth Wrinkles
description:
Active Cell Repair is a highly concentrated serum that packs a punch against aging. This ultimate formula contains the highest quality ingredients that are clinically proven to tighten, plump and diminish lines and wrinkles. The active ingredients will stimulate Collagen production while promoting new skin cells giving you a radiant youthful tone. Active cell is also proven to prevent aging by protecting the matrix of the skin from the everyday free radicals that directly cause signs of premature aging, dark spots and photo damage. This concentrate is all natural and highly concentrated so a small amount will go a long way. This product is also available in our extra large 4oz pump.

This product is chock full of natural essentials such as retinyls, vitamins A, B's, C, E plus citrus extracts none of which are attributed to acne, reactions or irritation in NORMAL skin  types.  If you have a history of acne and dermal irritations you should always check every listed ingredient and follow the directions for use.

title: NuFountain Fresh Cosmetics Genuine 20% L-Ascorbic Acid, Oil Free Vitamin C Serum Made Fresh When Ordered
description:
1 Fluid Ounce (30mL) of 20% L-Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) in purified water and glycerin base in sealed light-blocking bottle with dropper for dispensing serum. Fragrance free. Manufactured using only the freshest, highest-quality ingredients. Used daily, protects skin with antioxidant action to repair damage from UV, environment, and signs of aging. A daily regime results in firmer, smoother younger-looking skin. Can be used under sun block and makeup.

IMPORTANT STORAGE INFORMATION: Always store bottles in a cool, dark place. You may store serum in a refrigerator. Always store unopened bottles in the refrigerator.

SERUM CONSISTENCY:
NuFountain Fresh Cosmetics specializes in fresh-made serums using l-ascorbic acid which is water soluble. To effectively penetrate to your cellular level where it repairs free-radical damage, we do not use any oils, thickeners or unnecessary ingredients that make it thick and slow absorption. Our serums are very thin and since they are made fresh when ordered (free from oxidation which makes serums turn yellow, amber or brown and develop a strong odor), they are clear and appear water-like. This is what a great l-ascorbic acid serum should look and feel like. We produce fresh, honest l-ascorbic acid serums that are clear, and absorb immediately into your skin.

SPECIAL OFFER: Purchase 2 bottles -- get a 3rd bottle FREE -- Enter the total number of bottle you want (such as "3") and the price of 1 bottle will be deducted when you checkout -- and you can mix and match with other NuFountain serums.

ORDERING LARGER QUANTITIES: To get 6 bottles (total), enter "6" for quantity and you will get the price of 2 bottles discounted at checkout. You get 1 bottle discounted for every three ordered and there is no limit.

title: IQ Naturals:Complete Glycolic Acid 30% Chemical Facial Peel Kit (professional set)
description: Glycolic acid peels have been the leader in advanced skin treatments around the world for many years. These peels come in different concentrations varying from 10% to 80%. Glycolic acid is perhaps the best-known of a group of chemicals called fruit acids or alpha-hydroxy acids (AHA). AHA provides an excellent way to penetrate the surface of the skin, resulting in drastic improvements of the skins appearance and feel. Glycolic acid works as an exfoliating agent because of its high acidity but easy solubility. Glycolic Acid goes under the damaged upper layers of skin and destroys the 'glue' which holds dead skin to the surface. As this dead skin is chemically released, the other ingredients carry the individual flakes away and a water rinse neutralizes the remaining acid. The result is a much-smoother skin surface and a more youthful appearance. A secondary benefit is glycolic acid's ability to draw moisturizers into the newly-exfoliated skin surface.Alpha hydroxy acids are an entire family of acids, which can be derived from fruit, milk or sugar. These are most widely used in skin care products as an anti-aging agent. Try it once and you instantly see and feel the results! YOUR KIT INCLUDES: 30% Glycolic acid solution(sealed)1oz., Glycolic renewing toner 1oz., Glycolic renewing cleanser 1oz., Glycolic Therapy Moisturizer .50oz , Application fan Brush, Vinyl zipper case, Gauze pad and detailed application with precautions and preparation guides. Order today and enjoy long lasting results! Glycolic acid 70% is not buffered and its pH is 0.6, Glycolic 20%-50% are buffered to a pH of 2.6. Use with caution!

title: L'Oreal Paris Voluminous Extra-Volume Collagen Mascara, Blackest Black, 0.34 Ounces
description: Discover your lushest, most luxurious lashes with extra-volume collagen mascara. made with hydra-collagen, it enhances the thickness of your lashes for up to 12x more impact without any clumps. our patented brush is 50% bigger so it builds that incredible.

title: MyChelle Firming Serum, Serious Hyaluronic, 1-Ounce Bottle
description: An unsurpassed botanical firming serum with proven hyaluronic acid, marine oligopeptides, L-proline, resveratrol, copper peptides, and superoxide dismutase to support the connective tissue and visibly firm your skin.   Hydroxypropyl beta-cyclodextrin (from starch) adds to the firming effect by smoothing the skin and providing a protective moisture barrier without clogging skin pores.

title: Fake Bake Flawless, 6-Ounce
description: Fake Bake Flawless Self-Tan Liquid combines ease of application with intense professional colour development. Flawless is applied with a professional mitt (included) in effortless gliding strokes for a perfectly even tan. The dual function cosmetic bronzer assists in making the application even easier (shows-where-it-goes) whilst providing an instant golden tan. The fast drying, fast absorbing formula is transfer resistant, so can be worn throughout the day. Formulated with Fake Bake's exclusive triple tan formula (DHA boosted by DMI & Erythulose) for an intense tan that lasts longer. Suitable for all skin tones and skin types. Pleasantly fragranced with a tropical scent. No artificial preservatives or Parabens.
